column1:
share on x rj regina jenkins. jun 14 at 12:41 am dear rob , deb, and family, i'm so sorry for your loss and will be praying for god to hold you close and give you strength during this time. hugs, and prayers, regina jenkins. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 14. 4:00 pm - 6:00 pm stoudenmire-dowling funeral home2402 south irby street. florence, sc, us, 29505-342. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe stoudenmire dowling funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store 
show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of mary lois colones send comfort to the colones family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! ll lucy gaddy lee. jun 14 at 10:28 am i owe your mother a great debt of gratitude for all the times she helped mom and for keeping jared for me when james and i both had major surgery. jared says she bought him a red rubber tip bottle of glue and served him up lots of jello with fruit cocktail. she will be missed. she is with john now and is fully free indeed. comment share comment share facebook twitter
